entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Flurries beginning late in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
